title: Password Manager App
description: A native Android app to localy store passwords on your mobile phone. With AES ecryption and biometric authentication passwords are securily stored and quick and easy to access. I use this as my personal password manager

title: Portfolio Website
description: The current website you are vieweing. In a couple of weeks I taught myself JS, CSS and React, this website is a showcase of what I have learned so far, building it from the ground-up

title: Sudoku Game
description: Sudoku mobile game. Choose from 3 difficulty settings, track your average times, a different starting board generated every new game

title: Calculator App
description: This is a simple calculator app I wrote in Java using Gradle and Android Studio

title: Java Web Scraper App
description: Enter car models into the search bar to retrieve stock counts from pickapart.co.nz
